DataElement.preferredName: Minimal Residual Disease At End Second Course Status Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question relating to the status of the residual leukemic cells remaining determined by flow cytometry  after the second course of primary therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Minimal Residual Disease At End Second Course Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: remainder of a tumor or a neoplasm/cancer after primary, potentially curative therapy._Used to indicate position, location, or state (American Heritage Dictionary)_The point or place at which something terminates in time, space, or extent._Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude._A period of protocol-prescribed activity or intervention._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: remainder of a tumor or a neoplasm/cancer after primary, potentially curative therapy.

Concepts.definition: Evidence for remaining tumor following primary treatment that is only apparent using highly sensitive techniques.

Property.preferredDefinition: Used to indicate position, location, or state (American Heritage Dictionary):The point or place at which something terminates in time, space, or extent.:Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.:A period of protocol-prescribed activity or intervention.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: Used to indicate position, location, or state.
The point or place at which something terminates in time, space, or extent.
Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.
Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding.
A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
